lender.loan_because: To reach 50,000 poor women and families in during fy 10-11, 60% of them would be from poorest and poor families, 40% from old age, differently able and destitute. Improve well being increase income of a supported family by Rs. 1000/- per month. Reduce health expenditure of family by Rs. 500/- and increase enrollment of children to the school.
lender.occupational_info: The PSVK was started by help of few social workers to initiate unique model of social work, Self Help Group Creation, formal education and computer education through community participation first in Patna district of Bihar and further replicated in other district of Bihar and Jharkhand. lender.name: Kenneth Copeland
lender.occupational_info:
After the Sept. 11 attacks on America in 2001, Kenneth Copeland Ministries began an assault on the fear that plagued Christians. It was the next step in the ministrys 40-year mission to preach the uncompromised Word of God and proclaim from the top of the world to the bottom and all the way around that Jesus Is Lord! Since that time, founder Kenneth Copeland has produced many written, audio and video resources to help others develop the fruit of the spirit of love in their lives and remove the fear that paralyzes them.
Kenneth Copeland Ministries
Kenneth Copeland on myspace.com http://www.myspace.com/kencopeminnet squidoo.com | Gloria Copeland http://www.squidoo.com/kennethcopelandministries Kenneth Copeland Ministries - piczo.com http://kennethcopeland.piczo.com

lender.name: Tan
lender.loan_because: i need some piano lessons on jazz so that i can teach others or perform in a pub.
lender.occupational_info: it has been 2 years since i graduated from senior high school. i held a small shop selling toys and souvenirs with the help of my parents and unfortunately it's closed down for some both financial & faulty reasons.and now, my parents wouldn't help me anymore and i left my hometown(i was living in south China and now i'm in mid China). i used to work in a shop which sells musical instruments and i get fired for i played the piano someday during the noon and it was the third time that the manager warned me not to play the piano(though i play it in a low sound). without a diploma from a college, i can't find any job with a normal payment in China.which kind of job i can find is that they offer you 2 meals( lunch and supper) per day and maybe pay off your monthly pay later after you worked there reaching up to 3 months. i've nothing to say about the politics and educational system in china , but i know my situation and i decided to take a try here once an american friend kindly told me this website.

lender.loan_because: We want to share the monetary wedding gifts we received.

lender.name: ja-rist-kel
lender.loan_because: To provide an opportunity to increase the happiness and quality of life in another persons life. We believe the microloan program will have a greater impact for the cost than any other program in which we could participate. We are thankful to participate and extend best wishes to all.
lender.occupational_info: James teaches science at a 4-year college in the geographic center of the Unted States. Christina is an operating room nurse. Mikel is currently a college student studying biology.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I pay a lot in taxes to support bureaucrats, scammers and people I don't care about. I love the idea of voluntarily assisting individual hard-working people in search of help and not a handout.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Helping Others goes a long way...
lender.occupational_info: We are reaching out 2 the world to open there mind and eyes to see the bigger picture in hopes we can help others suceed and make alot of money too be financially independent and live the happiest and best life that they never thought was possible...

lender.name: Sidni and Cheryl
lender.loan_because: we can and we want to be part of the solution . We believe in women's strength and want to give them as many opportunities as possible to excel.
lender.occupational_info: We are both teachers: middle school and college.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: work makes us free.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I consider it not only my moral, but my spiritual duty to aid those in need. I have been helped numerous times, and by the grace of God, I still exist to do His work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student, studying foreign affairs and non-profit management.

lender.name: Joe
lender.occupation: Legal analyst for an investment bank
lender.loan_because: Non-profit lending after hours makes up for all my for-profit lending during the day

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell biodegradable hand wash and traditional soaps.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I have received many blessings from God during my lifetime and I enjoy being able to share these blessings financially, with someone less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I enter information from doctors into a computer so that medicines can be given to people who are ill , elderly or mentally or physically challenged.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I like making someone's a day a little bit brighter than it was when they woke up in the morning.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of community!
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in realizing their dreams of a college degree.

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: I was once in need of a stranger's help, luckily they came through. I wish to give back to the world that has given me a second chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a High School student in Canada.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I want to help others grow their business and improve their communities. i'm also looking for that certain business to invest in which may lead to a partnership
lender.occupational_info:
I am a fitness trainer. I teach peope how to exercise properly and eat right so they can get fit and look fit.
I am also a graduate student. I will have a master's degree in International Management in a few months and will be going for a Doctorate degree after that.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans are among the best possible options of supporting and thithing as the lenders will be given an option to grow their business and as such becoming independent of aid in the long run witch to me is much more healthy than staying victimized.

lender.name: Vladimir
lender.loan_because: I'd like to have a loan if I needed it.
